events.message: We have received your application for the Senior Software Engineer position and will review your credentials shortly.
After initial review, your application has been categorized under Engineering, specifically for the software development team.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case and will reach out with next steps soon.
We completed your initial screening call, discussing your experience with software architecture and development processes.
You confirmed your interest in the position and provided availability for a technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-10T14:00:00Z with the software development team lead.
The technical interview was successfully completed. Your problem-solving skills and coding expertise were impressive.
The HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-14T16:00:00Z to discuss compensation and company culture.
You completed the HR interview; all benefits and policies were reviewed, and mutual alignment was noted.
An official job offer has been proposed with competitive salary and benefits, sent via email for your review.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard and will start onboarding preparations.
Your onboarding process has started including system access setup, orientation scheduling, and welcome sessions.
The hiring process is now officially closed. You have been fully integrated into the engineering team successfully.
